name: FreeHolder
description: Blending strategy, survival, and roguelike elements with RPG style character development, FreeHolder is the story of three escaped slaves in the time of the Roman Republic. Farm, hunt, craft, and cook your way through the years as you live on the edge of the beginning of the Empire.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and Up Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 mb video memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 250 MB available space
